input_args.instruction: 'Context: The text mentions that Gene BTNL2 associates with Disease marginal zone lymphoma and Gene HLA-B associates with Disease diffuse large B-cell lymphoma. \n\nQuestion: Out of the given list, which Gene is associated with marginal zone lymphoma and diffuse large B-cell lymphoma. Given list is: FHOD3,  PBX2,  RP1, KALRN,  AHR'
